# mx

A collection of reusable functions for scientific computing.

## Installation

```bash
poetry add mx82
```

## Usage

```python
from mx82 import sf4

result = sf(1.23456)
print(result)
# 1.235
```

## Development

```bash
git clone https://github.com/OrtnerMichael/mx82.git
cd mx82
poetry install
```
